method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve a specific FIDO2 Metadata, issue an HTTP GET command on the metadata resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: id
param.doc: Internally assigned ID value of the FIDO2 Metadata

param.name: filename
param.doc: The filename of the FIDO2 Metadata

param.name: contents
param.doc: The content of the FIDO2 Metadata file, represented as an escaped character string. Maximum 2147483647 bytes.

response.doc: Bad Request. There is a problem with the request. The JSON result describes the problem.
Not Found. The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
